meanings.definition: A unit of digital information storage capacity equal to 1,024 terabytes.
meanings.sent1: My computer's hard drive can store a whole petabyte of data.
meanings.sent2: The company's server farm has multiple petabytes of storage space.
meanings.sent3: I tried to download a petabyte of cat videos, but my internet crashed!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a petabyte, storing every detail of our childhood.
meanings.sent5: The petabyte of information overwhelmed the researchers with its sheer volume.

meanings.definition: A very large amount of data storage capacity, typically used in reference to computer systems.
meanings.sent1: The new data center can hold a petabyte of information.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are working on developing storage systems capable of handling petabytes of data.
meanings.sent3: I have so many photos on my phone, it's like a petabyte of memories!
meanings.sent4: The library's archives contain a petabyte of knowledge waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The petabyte of music files filled the room with a symphony of digital sound.
